name: DOT Communications
description:
Why come to DOT Communications for your public relations solution? At the heart of the answer to that question are three words: connections, relationships and results. As a highly creative multi-talented team of experienced professionals, DOT is small enough to intimately understand the needs of its clients. But yet it is large enough to create the connections and leverage the relationships essential to establishing you as a market leader.
DOT Communications is a full service public relations firm headquartered in Washington, DC. It offers all the services essential to success in today’s competitive media market—advertising and marketing, media relations and event planning. In addition, DOT has extensive knowledge and expertise in reaching African American audiences.
